about_the_game:
Eclipse is a 2D spell-based RPG that falls into the vein of a souls-like. 

  • Journey through a grim, infected, and interconnected world with plenty of secret paths that may derail your original goals.

  • There is a wide array of spells to use for offense, defense, and support that will help you tear through any challenges your faced with in a fast-paced environment.

  • NPCs will task you with making a choice that can change the course of your game, from altering further dialogue to replacing game zones.

  • Difficulty - Eclipse starts off relatively easy, but quickly ramps up to match with other games in the souls-like genre. Certain resources you can find through exploration will help to lower the difficulty a bit, or make it more challenging for those who desire it.

Game Mechanics:

  • Spells are your primary way to both navigate the world, and deal with any difficult problems that come your way.

    • Basic Spells don't deal much damage, but they are fast to cast while costing minimal stamina.

    • Offensive Spells deal a large chunk of damage for a much slower cast time and larger cost to cast.

    • Support Spells are expensive in cost and windup time, but they can support you with things like healing, speed, and damage increases.

  • Consumable Spells are the same as normal spells, but they don't cost any stamina and have an increased effectiveness. The drawback for consumables is that after you use it, it is gone from your playthrough forever.

  • Rings are a system similar to the ones found in other Souls-Like games, but instead of being a supplement to your stats, they are the sole way to change them around. Because of this, rings have a heavy effect on different stats like health, stamina, damage, and movement speed.

  • Souls are dropped by the most powerful bosses in Eclipse, gifting you with a new ability such as Double Jump, Wall Jump, and Vision as well as others.

Accessibility Features:

  • Custom Keyboard Controls

  • Controller Support

  • Toggleable HUD

  • Toggleable Camera Shake

Hunt through the lands of Mondreich, find a cure for you infection, and seek salvation in Eclipse.
